StartRoom.Text: This is the start room to the test story.

Action3: This is the third action. It will end the game.

RoomTwo.Text: This is room two. There will be a puzzle here.

RoomThree.Text: There is an enemy in this room.

Action1: This is the first attack action.
Action2: This is the second attack action.
Action3: This is the third attack action.

LastRoom.Text: This is the last room in the test story.

TestStory.EndLose: You have lost the test story.
TestStory.EndWin: You have won the test story.
